Documentation

readHeadCommit :: IO ShaHash Source #

Reads commit ref from HEAD file. Reference types: 0ccd3a1dacc3aa196c00b847d0134dba9adc9094 refs/master

storeHeadCommit :: ShaHash -> IO () Source #

Stores ref to newest commit in HEAD file.

createBranch :: BranchName -> ShaHash -> IO () Source #

Creates branch ref.

initHead :: IO () Source #

Initalizes HEAD file with master branch.

branchCommand :: IO () Source #

Lists existing branches
